DataElement.preferredName: Patient Other Investigational Or Commercial Agent Or Therapeutic Procedure Receive Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria Code Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The coded indicator to determine eligibility for clinical trial participation with regards to the patient receiving other investigational or commercial agents, or therapies as outlined in the study protocol.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Other Investigational Or Commercial Agent Or Therapeutic Procedure Receive Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned._In the process of being studied; experimental._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._Stability data for a commercial lot._An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect._An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise._An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process._To take, accept, or get something offered._Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Other Investigational Or Commercial Lot Agent Or Therapeutic Procedure Receive Clinical Trial Eligibility Criteria
Property.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:In the process of being studied; experimental.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:Stability data for a commercial lot.:An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.:An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.:An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.:To take, accept, or get something offered.:Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
In the process of being studied; experimental.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
Stability data for a commercial lot.
An active power or cause (as principle, substance, physical or biological factor, etc.) that produces a specific effect.

An article used to connect words, phrases, or clauses representing alternatives; used to connect alternative terms for the same thing; used in correlation; used to correct or rephrase what was previously said; otherwise.
An action or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter or stop a pathologic process.
To take, accept, or get something offered.
Characteristics which are necessary to allow a subject to participate in a clinical study, as outlined in the study protocol. The concept covers inclusion and exclusion criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

ValueDomain.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator to represent a response of Yes, No, or Not Applicable._The affirmative response to a question or activity._The non-affirmative response to a question._Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context._A system of numbered categories for representation of data.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredName: Yes No Not Applicable Code Indicator
RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question or activity.:The non-affirmative response to a question.:Determination that a value is not relevant in the current context.:A system of numbered categories for representation of data.:An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.
The non-affirmative response to a question.
Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.
A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Created to support Theradex design of CRFs for NCI CCR trials

ReferenceDocuments.name: Has patient received any othe
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any other investigational or commercial agents or therapies administered with the intention to treat their leukemia within 14 days or five half-lives (whichever is shorter) of first receipt of study drug, with the exception of hydroxyurea used to control white blood cell counts?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Theradex - 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Has patient received any other investigational or commercial agents or therapies administered with the intention to treat their leukemia within 14 days or five half-lives (whichever is shorter) of first receipt of study drug, with the exception of hydroxyurea used to control white blood cell counts to less than or equal to 50,000/mm3?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient receive any other investigational agents within 4 weeks prior to study enrollment?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was patient initiated with another investigational drug within 4 weeks prior to enrollment, unless cleared by the Principal Investigator?

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Was patient initiated with another investigational drug within 4 weeks prior to enrollment, unless cleared by the Study Chair?
